name: EYEMAGINE
tag_list: ecommerce, ecommerce-agency, ecommerce-design, ecommerce-development, magento-development, magento-gold-solution-partner, magento-solution-partner, magento-agency, web-design, web-development, systems-integration, responsive-design, magento, mobile-commer
overview:
EYEMAGINE is an E-commerce and web development agency that specializes in designing and developing eCommerce storefronts for use by businesses and consumers. EYEMAGINE operates as a Magento Gold Solutions Partner for eCommerce design and development, having created a number of custom Magento applications and extensions tailored for the eCommerce and mobile application industries. EYEMAGINE has most recently expanded into Magento Mobile Applications compatible with Apple iPhone devices.

The company also performs client-based services in creative design, branding and marketing, software development, and Magento web design and development. EYEMAGINE has worked with TOYOTA, The Walt Disney Company, Hewlett-Packard, Cisco, Metallica, Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, and small businesses such as The Persimmon Tree Tea Company, INKnBURN, ArtDen, and Universal Audio.

EYEMAGINE was founded in 2003 by Andy Etemadi and within three years the company progressed to performing Open-source software development and web design. In 2008, EYEMAGINE began focusing on eCommerce web projects and partnered with Magento, a now popular open source eCommerce platform, before its initial version 1.0 launch. EYEMAGINE became a Magento Solutions Partner in 2012.

Since 2008, EYEMAGINE has diversified its operations to include SEO services, User Experience and logo design services, web development, iPhone/Android application development, and a module store selling custom Magento extensions.

Some of its more notable projects during this time included developing Bath Simple, a custom bathroom configurator that allows users to visualize and order all materials necessary to remodel their home bathroom, mobile game application Dabball, and a mobile website for TOYOTA dealers.

EYEMAGINE redesigned their website in June 2012 and rebranded itself as a premier eCommerce web development agency and Magento Solutions partner. The company also earned Magento Gold Level Solutions Partner status in 2012 and began requiring its developers to pass the certification test administered by Magento. In 2011 and 2012, the agency doubled in size and added more clients to its portfolio, including Metallica, GroVia and Jones Soda. EYEMAGINE has acted as the Magento Subject Matter Experts for large firms including Disney and Hewlett-Packard.

In 2013, EYEMAGINE won a Webby Honoree Award in the consumer electronics category in the 17th Annual Webby Awards.

A portion of all development revenue earned by EYEMAGINE is donated to Love Mercy, a non-profit organization supporting over 40 poverty relief projects in Kitale, Kenya and Haiti.

EYEMAGINE performs a number of client-based services in the eCommerce industry, including: Magento Certified Development and Design Ethical Software Development Cross-Platform and Systems Integration Custom Magento Theme Design User Experience Design Web and Logo Design SEO Usability and A/B Testing Competitive Analysis Quality Assurance UI/UX Design and Development Custom Module Development Responsive Design and Development Mobile Commerce Applications.

milestones.description: EYEMAGINE distinguished as a Webby Award Honoree in consumer electronics in the 17th Annual Webby Awards.
